title: Investigating chemical pre-treatment methods: Valorization of wheat straw to enhance polyhydroxyalkanoate (PHA) production with novel isolate Bacillus paranthracis RSKS-3
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Rohan Samir Kumar Sachan, Inderpal Devgon, Vikas Sharma, Kahkashan Perveen, Najat A. Bukhari, Jamilah A. Alsulami, Vikash Singh Jadon, Deep Chandra Suyal, Arun Karnwal
